name: Egavas News Project
short_description: This is your basic news poster, however, it has a few twists.  The idea is that you can post messages to be stored in any format (ie. XML, MySQL, etc).  Messages can be retrieved in the same way.  It is written in all java using jsp and taglibs.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Message Boards
